meanings.definition: The act of cleaning and polishing a car.
meanings.sent1: After the valeting, the car sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I need to schedule a valeting for my car next week.
meanings.sent3: The valeting of the car was so thorough, even the tiniest speck of dirt was gone.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in valeting the car was like an artist creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The valeting service made my car look brand new again.

meanings.definition: The person who cleans and polishes cars.
meanings.sent1: The valeting at the car wash did a fantastic job on my vehicle.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a skilled valeting and always makes cars shine.
meanings.sent3: The valeting greeted me with a friendly smile before starting work on my car.
meanings.sent4: I trust the valeting to take good care of my car every time.
meanings.sent5: The valeting's expertise in car detailing is unmatched.
